```{r}
library(readr)

data <- read_delim("C:/Users/daysif/Desktop/Mineria-de-Datos/data/ROW.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, locale = locale(decimal_mark = ",", 
         grouping_mark = "."), trim_ws = TRUE)

cols(
  Adgroup = col_character(),
  MaxCPC = col_double(),
  Clicks = col_integer(),
  Impressions = col_integer(),
  CTR = col_double(),
  AvgCPC = col_double(),
  Costo = col_double(),
  AvgPosicion = col_double(),
  Qscore = col_character(),
  Ventas = col_integer(),
  Costconv = col_double(),
  Convrate = col_double(),
  Allconv = col_integer()
)
table(data$Adgroup)
```
